ftp path to the directory of GEO accession (GDS, GSE or GPL)

Source: R/ftp.R
gds_ftp.Rd

ftp path to the directory of GEO accession (GDS, GSE or GPL)

gds_ftp(accession)

gse_ftp(accession)

gpl_ftp(accession)

Arguments

accession

character. like 'GDS479', 'GSE3', 'GPL2570'

Value

character. ftp path to directory, without trailing /.

Examples

gds_ftp('GDS479')
#> [1] "ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/datasets/GDSnnn/GDS479"

gse_ftp('GSE3')
#> [1] "ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSEnnn/GSE3"

gpl_ftp('GPL2570')
#> [1] "ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/platforms/GPL2nnn/GPL2570"

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
